        public int compute()
        Description copied from interface: simplification.Term
        Compute the integer value of an expression. The expression is closed that is wihout variable. Use the call by value mechanism for binaries that is compute left and right then apply operator

      • engine

        public simplification.Term engine()
        Description copied from interface: simplification.Term

        Specified by:

        public simplification.Term oneReduction()
        Description copied from interface: simplification.Term
